divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and i were watching the pleiades meteor showers when my son got tired andgot up we were watching them in my side yard to go to bed as he was about toturn the corner he turned to say good night but stopped short and pointed up andbehind me. i got up to see what it was that he was pointing to and there was abright light coming toward us. as it got closer we could that the shape wastriangular in shape with a brilliant white light at each corner.this object was jet black in color but we could tell the shape by thedisappearence of the stars and the reappearence behind it. the object made nosound and moved directly overhead. its lights seemed brilliant but had no extralighting outside of the beam of each of the three lights. its travel was in anorth-east direction and was in site till the tree line obscured it. tree lineis approx. 14 mile behind my house
Summary: triangle with lights on each corner
